long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EcoTab: Your Daily Green Guide 🌿

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing EcoTab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the services in Terms of Use https://eco-tab.net/terms.html and Privacy Policy https://eco-tab.net/privacy.html

EcoTab is a browser extension that brings eco-awareness right to your fingertips. Each time you open a new tab, you’ll see a beautiful image of nature and a quick eco-fact that’s easy to understand and share. 🌳
It’s all about making better choices for our planet. EcoTab offers everyday tips and insights into how you can make a difference with simple actions. From recycling smarter to saving energy, every tab is a new chance to learn and do better.

Main features:

🌱 Daily Eco Challenge: Choose from different daily actions to reduce your environmental impact and challenge yourself to live more sustainably.

📚 Eco Facts: Get a fresh eco-fact with each new tab, giving you the info you need to be more environmentally friendly.

📸 Nature Photos: Enjoy stunning photos of the natural world while you browse, reminding us all what we’re working to protect.

♻️ Sustainable Living Tips: Quick, actionable tips to help you become more eco-conscious in your daily life.

By using EcoTab, you’re joining a community that’s making small changes with a big impact. Install EcoTab and let’s make every click count for the environment. 🌎🌿
